  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MouseTrack
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is used to time how long it takes the user to beat the game.

    1.0 June 11th 2013
    Author:
    Reyno Tilikaynen, Jonah Haber
